sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble registers a 3.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike ( NKE ), trading down 2.0%.
Nike is showing a gain of 2.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Intel ( INTC ), trading down 1.4%, and Merck & Co ( MRK ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
